page.title: 15SOCIAL CONCERNS IN BRAMSHAW
page.content: { TRAFFIC.}Speeding along narrow roads results in deaths of animals but we feel road widening is not the answer,& fencing would spoil the unique character of the Forest. A speed limit would help.A restriction on large lorries is pressed for. {LIVESTOCK.}Should the numbers left on the Forest be restricted? {OIL EXPLORATION.}If this is allowed there is fear the ecological balance & landscape may be affected. {TOURISM. }The numbers of walkers, campers & horseriders should be carefully controlled. {AMENITIES.}Lack of leisure amenities for the young & lack of transport affecting old & young. Threat to shop & PO. Financial problem if maintaining the fabric of village hall & church. Loss of small cottages due to enlargement by middle class newcomers.
